params.fee: The amount (in base unit) that must be paid
params.feePaidTo: The address that should receive payment of the fee
params.feeToken: The token contract the fee must be paid in (if any). Address(0) designates native Ether.
params.guildHash: The ENS namehash of the guild's domain

params.claimant: The address attempting to claim the tag (not necessarily the address that will receive it)
params.extraClaimArgs: Any additional arguments that would be passed by the minter to the claimGuildTag() function
params.guildHash: The ENS namehash of the guild's domain
params.tag: The tag being claimed (e.g. 'foo' for foo.my-guild.eth)

returns.fee: The amount (in base unit) that must be paid
returns.feePaidTo: The address that should receive payment of the fee
returns.tokenContract: The token contract the fee must be paid in (if any). Address(0) designates native Ether.

setFlatFee(bytes32,address,uint256,addre.notice: Configures a flat fee for the given guild. The caller must be the guild's admin

tagClaimFee(bytes32,string,address,bytes.notice: Returns the fee required to mint the given guild tag by the given minter

userdoc.notice: A common implementation of FeePolicy that can be used to configure flat-rate fees for multiple guilds simultaneously
